content: I've got to reach out to more suppliers and{A期待搓手} let everyone know that <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> now has a brand-new shop of its own!
info: 友邻露卡瓶1-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: If you hadn't been here, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, this never would have become a reality. {A喜欢}You've made my dreams come true.
info: 友邻露卡瓶1-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Please take this jar of <style=Highlight>Neighbor's Luca</style>. Let's get excited for the big shop opening <style=Highlight>tomorrow</style>!
info: 友邻露卡瓶1-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: So you've picked this spot for the shop? I know I ought to stay by my stall, but I... I couldn't help {A庆祝}sneaking over for a sneaky peek...
info: 友邻露卡瓶1-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Just thinking about tomorrow — we'll have a new shop on our planet! <style=SizeSmall>Goodness, my tail just won't stop wagging...</style>
